GP12vd3343au:0: ANALYTIC VERSION according to BHELA conventions:
GP12vd3343au:7: PADA MARKERS For a four-pada verse:
GP12vd3343au:9: vajra uvāca atī1va sumukhā3rādhyo $ devo viṣṇur uru-kramaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:10: stutena darśayām āsa $ viśva-rūpaṃ dvi-janmanām // Vdha_3,343.1 //
GP12vd3343au:11: prasādaṃ paramaṃ tasya $ brūhi bhakta-jane mama &
GP12vd3343au:12: tṛptiṃ brahman na gacchāmi $ śṛṇvann etat kathā2mṛtam // Vdha_3,343.2 //
GP12vd3343au:13: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca sa vidhi-jño mahā-rāja $ mātaliḥ śakra-sārathiḥ &
GP12vd3343au:14: tasyā7sti sadṛśī kanyā $ guṇakāśī9ti viśrutā // Vdha_3,343.3 //
GP12vd3343au:15: mātalir nāradaś caiva $ anveṣṭuṃ tad vanaṃ (?) purā &
GP12vd3343au:17: sumukhā3khyaṃ dadṛśatus $ tau gṛhītvā gatāv ubhau &
GP12vd3343au:18: nāge śakraṃ tataḥ śakrād $ ayācetāṃ tu tāv ubhau // Vdha_3,343.5 //
GP12vd3343au:19: sumukhasyā7bhayaṃ tārkṣyāt $ tayoḥ śakro dadau varam &
GP12vd3343au:20: vīrya-jñas tārkṣya-vīryasya $ sa yayau keśavā1ntikam // Vdha_3,343.6 //
GP12vd3343au:22: ājagāma tatas tārkṣyaḥ $ sa-roṣaḥ keśavā1ntikam // Vdha_3,343.7 //
GP12vd3343au:23: garuḍa uvāca kim avajñāya māṃ kṛṣṇa $ sumukhe dīyate varaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:24: mama pṛṣṭha-gataḥ śatruṃs $ tvaṃ nihaṃsi ca buddhyase &
GP12vd3343au:25: kuṭumbā3bharaṇaṃ śatruṃ $ pannagaṃ mama rakṣasi // Vdha_3,343.8 //
GP12vd3343au:26: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca evam uktas tadā tena $ viṣṇur garuḍam abravīt // Vdha_3,343.9 //
GP12vd3343au:28: na me śakto jagad voḍhuṃ $ sakalaṃ vihage3śvara &
GP12vd3343au:30: śaktiś ced asti voḍhuṃ te $ bhujam ekaṃ vahasva me &
GP12vd3343au:31: evam uktvā dadau pṛṣṭhe $ tasya savyaṃ bhujaṃ hariḥ // Vdha_3,343.11 //
GP12vd3343au:33: klānto dīnaś ca tuṣṭāva $ deveśaṃ madhu-sūdanam // Vdha_3,343.12 //
GP12vd3343au:34: garuḍa uvāca namas te devadeve3śa $ surā1sura-namas-kṛta &
GP12vd3343au:37: tvam eva deva trailokyaṃ $ sadā dhārayase 'nagha // Vdha_3,343.14 //
GP12vd3343au:38: ātmānam ātmanā deva $ tvam eva vahase sadā &
GP12vd3343au:39: yasya te deva sakalaṃ $ dehe tribhuvanaṃ sthitam // Vdha_3,343.15 //
GP12vd3343au:40: tasya voḍhuṃ kathaṃ śaktā $ mad-vidhā hi sahasraśaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:41: tasmāt prasīda bhagavan $ mama dhvaja-nivāsinaḥ // Vdha_3,343.16 //
GP12vd3343au:42: nā7sty antas tava deve3śa $ karmaṇāṃ bhuvana-traye &
GP12vd3343au:43: kas te kīrtayituṃ śaktaḥ $ karmāṇy anavaśeṣataḥ // Vdha_3,343.17 //
GP12vd3343au:44: karmaṇāṃ kīrtanaṃ vā te $ kā stutiḥ parame3śvara &
GP12vd3343au:45: sarvatra sarva-śaktis tvaṃ $ prasīda mama śatru-han // Vdha_3,343.18 //
GP12vd3343au:49: prasīda me namas te 'stu $ pakṣiṇo dhvaja-vāsinaḥ // Vdha_3,343.20 //
GP12vd3343au:50: śrībhagavān uvāca ātma-saṃbhāvanā tārkṣya $ na kāryā te kadācana &
GP12vd3343au:51: aham evā8tmanā0tmānaṃ $ vahāmi tvāṃ ca dhāraye // Vdha_3,343.21 //
GP12vd3343au:52: prītā na ca tvayā bhāryā $ yad apakṣaḥ kṛto hy asi &
GP12vd3343au:53: mayā tribhuvanaṃ nyastaṃ $ tvad-artham akhilaṃ bhuje // Vdha_3,343.22 //
GP12vd3343au:54: tvayā tulyo hi balavāṃl $ loke 'nyo nā7sti kaścana &
GP12vd3343au:55: yasya dordaṇḍa-saṃsparśāj $ jīvitaṃ na ca nirgatam // Vdha_3,343.23 //
GP12vd3343au:57: viśeṣavantaḥ pakṣā1nte $ bhaviṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ // Vdha_3,343.24 //
GP12vd3343au:58: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca evam uktaḥ suparṇas tu $ suparṇān prāptavān punaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:60: evaṃ puruṣavat tārkṣyaḥ $ stūyamānaś ca śārṅgiṇam &
GP12vd3343au:61: bhūya eva suparṇa-(t)tvaṃ $ gamito 'tibalaḥ kṛtaḥ // Vdha_3,343.26 //
GP12vd3343au:63: tasmād rājan vijānīhi $ tasya dānava-vidviṣaḥ // Vdha_3,343.27 //
GP12vd3343au:64: nā7sty adeyaṃ hi bhakteṣu $ deva-rājyam api dhruvam &
GP12vd3343au:66: smṛta-mātraḥ sa deve3śas $ tad-bhayād vinivartakaḥ // Vdha_3,343.28 //
GP12vd3343au:73: vajra uvāca śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ tvattaḥ $ prasādaṃ paramaṃ hi yat &
GP12vd3343au:74: kṛtaṃ bhakta-jane tena $ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // Vdha_3,344.1 //
GP12vd3343au:75: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca hate tribhuvane rājañ $ śakrasya balinā purā &
GP12vd3343au:76: jagāma śakraḥ śaraṇaṃ $ kaśyapaṃ pitaraṃ tataḥ // Vdha_3,344.2 //
GP12vd3343au:78: tam āha varado brahmā $ gaccha kaśyapa keśavam // Vdha_3,344.3 //
GP12vd3343au:80: taṃ ca prārthaya putratve $ sa te putro bhaviṣyati // Vdha_3,344.4 //
GP12vd3343au:81: tataḥ sa sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ $ deva-rājasya dāsyati &
GP12vd3343au:82: evaṃ co7ktaḥ kaśyapas tu $ sā1rdhaṃ tridaśa-puṅgavaiḥ // Vdha_3,344.5 //
GP12vd3343au:83: kṣīrā1bdhiṃ sa tato gatvā $ dadarśa tapasā harim &
GP12vd3343au:84: dṛṣṭvā stavena tuṣṭāva $ tatas tasya tadā hariḥ // Vdha_3,344.6 //
GP12vd3343au:86: tribhir natais tribhuvanaṃ $ sarvam ākramya viśva-dhṛk // Vdha_3,344.7 //
GP12vd3343au:87: prādāc chakrāya rājendra $ baddhvā daitye3śvaraṃ balim &
GP12vd3343au:88: kaśyapena stutas tv evaṃ $ tasya putratvam āgataḥ // Vdha_3,344.8 //
GP12vd3343au:89: vajra uvāca stavena yena tuṣṭāva $ kaśyapo madhusūdanam &
GP12vd3343au:90: taṃ stavaṃ tvaṃ samācakṣva $ sarva-pāpa-haraṃ śivam // Vdha_3,344.9 //
GP12vd3343au:91: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca śṛṇu rājan stavaṃ puṇyaṃ $ kaśyapena prakīrtitam &
GP12vd3343au:93: kaśyapa uvāca oṃ namo 'stu te devadeva ekaśṛṅga
GP12vd3343au:97: anindita bhadra kapila viṣvaksena dhruva dharma dharmadhvaja vaikuṇṭha vṛṣāvarta
GP12vd3343au:132: sahasraśas tvām āhur vedavido vedavidam sarveṣām eva viśvatvam āhuḥ
GP12vd3343au:135: svāhā makheṣu bhāga-prāśinaṃ śata-dhāraṃ sahasradhāraṃ ca bhūr vā bhuvar vā tvam eva
GP12vd3343au:137: brāhmaṇeya brahmā diśas tvam eva dyaur asi pṛthivy asi mātariśvā9si
GP12vd3343au:138: hotā potā mantā netā homya-hetus tvam evā7grya
GP12vd3343au:139: viśva-dhāmnā tvam eva digbhiḥ srag-bhāṇḍa ījyo 'si
GP12vd3343au:140: semiṃdhis (??) tvam eva gatir matimatām asi
GP12vd3343au:161: viśva-bhuk tvam eva bhuvi-krama atibhūḥ prabhā-kara śambhuḥ
GP12vd3343au:174: pārśva tvam eva viśva varā1rthinas trāhī7ti
GP12vd3343au:175: stotreṇa yaḥ kāśyapa-nirmitena $ stotraṃ sadā deva-varasya kartā &
GP12vd3343au:176: kālyaṃ śucis tad-gata-mānasena $ gantā sa lokān puruṣottamasya //
GP12vd3343au:180: vajra uvāca prasādaṃ paramaṃ tasya $ keśavasya mahā3tmanaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:181: brūhi bhakta-jane mahyaṃ $ deva-devasya cakriṇaḥ // Vdha_3,345.1 //
GP12vd3343au:182: na hi tṛpyāmy ahaṃ tasya $ śṛṇvānaḥ śravaṇā1mṛtam &
GP12vd3343au:183: hasta-trāṇa-prado loke $ ya ekaḥ patatāṃ nṛṇām // Vdha_3,345.2 //
GP12vd3343au:184: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca devāś ca ṛṣayaś caiva $ vivadantaḥ purā9nagha &
GP12vd3343au:185: bījair yaṣṭavyam ity etat $ tri-varṣa-paramo1ṣitaiḥ // Vdha_3,345.3 //
GP12vd3343au:187: pakṣo 'yam āsīd dharma-jña $ ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitā3tmanām // Vdha_3,345.4 //
GP12vd3343au:188: devānāṃ tu paśuḥ pakṣas $ tato mārgā3gato [']bhavat &
GP12vd3343au:189: rājo9paricaro nāma $ vasur vasu-matāṃ varaḥ // Vdha_3,345.5 //
GP12vd3343au:190: devāś ca ṛṣayaś caiva $ papṛcchantas tadā vasum &
GP12vd3343au:191: yatho9panītair yaṣṭavyam $ ity uktaṃ vasunā purā // Vdha_3,345.6 //
GP12vd3343au:195: nidhanā1rthaṃ matiṃ cakrur $ deva-bhaktasya dānavāḥ // Vdha_3,345.8 //
GP12vd3343au:197: nyavedayaṃs tathā cakraṃ $ devā3cārye bṛhaspatau // Vdha_3,345.9 //
GP12vd3343au:198: bṛhaspatis tato gatvā $ bhūmer vivara-gaṃ nṛpam &
GP12vd3343au:199: rakṣām adhyāpayām āsa $ vaiṣṇavīm aparājitām // Vdha_3,345.10 //
GP12vd3343au:202: adhyāpya taṃ ca rājānam $ idam āha bṛhaspatiḥ // Vdha_3,345.11 //
GP12vd3343au:203: bṛhaspatir uvāca iha-stho bhokṣyase rājan $ vasor dhārāṃ hutāṃ dvijaiḥ &
GP12vd3343au:204: devatānāṃ prasādena $ tayā cā8pyāyitaḥ sadā // Vdha_3,345.12 //
GP12vd3343au:205: vidyayā cā7nayā rājann $ avadhyas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi &
GP12vd3343au:207: evam uktvā sa rājānaṃ $ tatraivā7ntaradhīyata // Vdha_3,345.13 //
GP12vd3343au:208: vajra uvāca rakṣāṃ tu tāṃ me kathaya dvijendra $ kṛtā tu yā deva-purohitena &
GP12vd3343au:209: rājño vasor bhūmi-bila-sthitasya $ rakṣā hi sā9gryā paramā matā me //
GP12vd3343au:212: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya /
GP12vd3343au:233: namo 'stu te namo 'stu te namo 'stu te /
GP12vd3343au:236: hana hana paca paca matha matha vidhvaṃsaya vidhvaṃsaya vidrāvaya vidrāvaya śaṅkhena cakreṇa vajreṇa gadayā musalena halena bhasmī-kuru /
GP12vd3343au:265: ya imām aparājitāṃ parama-vaiṣṇavīṃ siddhāṃ mahā-vidyāṃ japati paṭati śṛṇoti smarati dhārayati
GP12vd3343au:274: tad yathā oṃ namo 'stu te anaghe /
GP12vd3343au:303: sthalagataṃ jalagatam antarikṣa-gataṃ vā rakṣa rakṣa sarva-bhūtebhyaḥ
GP12vd3343au:305: yasyāḥ praṇaśyate puṣpaṃ $ garbho vā patate yadi &
GP12vd3343au:306: mriyante bālakā yasyāḥ $ kāka-vandhyā ca yā bhavet // Vdha_3,346.1 //
GP12vd3343au:307: śastraṃ dhārayate hy eṣāṃ $ samare kāṇḍa-dāruṇi &
GP12vd3343au:310: tad yathā hana hana kālaṃ sara sara
GP12vd3343au:311: gauri gauri dhama dhama vidye alitāle (?)
GP12vd3343au:312: māle gandhe bandhe paca paca vidye nāśaya vā saṃhara duḥsvapnaṃ vināśaya /
GP12vd3343au:330: oṃ drauṃdrauṃ jroṃjroṃ kroṃkroṃ turu turu yeṣāṃ dviṣanti pratyakṣaṃ paro[']kṣaṃ vā sarvān dama dama marda marda tāpaya tāpaya gopaya gopaya utsādaya utsādaya /
GP12vd3343au:365: yathā-manīṣitaṃ kāryaṃ tan mama sidhyatu svāhā /
GP12vd3343au:377: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca evaṃ hi kṛta-rakṣasya $ vasu-dhārām upāśnataḥ &
GP12vd3343au:381: āgamya vāgbhir ugrābhis $ tarjayantaś ca te vasum &
GP12vd3343au:382: nirjaghnur āyudhair bhīmair $ deva-pakṣa-paraṃ sadā // Vdha_3,346.3 //
GP12vd3343au:383: na ca te 'sya rujaṃ cakrur $ na ca tān apy udīkṣitā &
GP12vd3343au:384: cintayām āsa deve3śaṃ $ manasā madhusūdanam // Vdha_3,346.4 //
GP12vd3343au:385: tato niṣphala-yatnās te $ dṛṣṭvā tan mahad adbhutam &
GP12vd3343au:386: jagmuḥ sarve gṛhān eva $ vilakṣā daitya-dānavāḥ // Vdha_3,346.5 //
GP12vd3343au:389: gatvā garuḍa rājānam $ vasuṃ śīghram ihā8naya // Vdha_3,346.6 //
GP12vd3343au:390: evam uktaḥ sa garuḍo $ deva-devena cakriṇā &
GP12vd3343au:395: tuṣṭāva garuḍaṃ vāgbhir $ arthyābhir amita-kriyaḥ // Vdha_3,346.9 //
GP12vd3343au:396: vasur uvāca namasyāmi mahā-bāhuṃ $ kha-ge1ndraṃ hari-vāhanam &
GP12vd3343au:401: gaja-kacchapatāṃ prāptau $ tāv ubhau vaira-saṃyutau // Vdha_3,346.12 //
GP12vd3343au:404: nakha-sthau tau tvayā nītau $ hatau bhuktau ca pakṣi-pa &
GP12vd3343au:407: niṣādī-śastato (?) muktas $ tatrā7pi brāhmaṇas tvayā // Vdha_3,346.15 //
GP12vd3343au:409: śākhā bhinnāḥ sthitā yatra $ vālakhilyāḥ sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,346.16 //
GP12vd3343au:410: tāṃs tu vaktra-gatān kṛtvā $ nakha-sthair gaja-kacchapaiḥ &
GP12vd3343au:411: nabhasy eva nirālambe $ sarvataḥ parivāritaḥ // Vdha_3,346.17 //
GP12vd3343au:412: tvayā jitvā raṇe sarvān $ devāñ śakra-puro-gamān &
GP12vd3343au:413: āhṛtaṃ tu paraṃ somaṃ $ vahner vā9py atha kāśyapa // Vdha_3,346.18 //
GP12vd3343au:414: nāgau dṛṣṭi-viṣau kṛtvā $ rajasā bhuvi cakṣuṣoḥ &
GP12vd3343au:415: jihvā2gra-nitya-gaṃ bhuñjañ $ cakre tau deva-nirmitau // Vdha_3,346.19 //
GP12vd3343au:416: āhṛtyā7pi tvayā somaṃ $ nītam eva na bhakṣitam &
GP12vd3343au:417: tena viṣṇor dhvaja-sthāne $ vāhana-tvaṃ gato hy asi // Vdha_3,346.20 //
GP12vd3343au:418: tvayā nikṣipya darbheṣu $ somaṃ nāgāś ca vañcitāḥ &
GP12vd3343au:419: jahāra sahasā yatra $ tac chīghraṃ bala-sūdanaḥ // Vdha_3,346.21 //
GP12vd3343au:420: yatra jihvā dvidhā bhūtā $ panna-gānāṃ dvijo1ttamāḥ &
GP12vd3343au:421: vinatā mocitā dāsyāt $ kaṭvā pūrvaṃ jitā paṇe // Vdha_3,346.22 //
GP12vd3343au:422: uccaiḥśravās tu kiṃ-varṇaḥ $ śukla ity eva bhāṣatī &
GP12vd3343au:423: kṛṣṇa-vālam ahaṃ manye $ pucchaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva vāk-chalāt // Vdha_3,346.23 //
GP12vd3343au:426: tasya pakṣasya deve1ndro $ yadā nā7ntaṃ hi dṛṣṭavān &
GP12vd3343au:427: tadā tava suparṇe7ti $ nāma khyātaṃ jagat-traye // Vdha_3,346.25 //
GP12vd3343au:428: tejasā bhāskaraṃ devaṃ $ javena ca samīraṇam &
GP12vd3343au:429: na te tulyo mahā-bhāga $ nāga-pakṣa-kṣayaṃ-kara // Vdha_3,346.26 //
GP12vd3343au:431: kṣipraṃ praṇāśam āyāti $ tathā sarva-bhayāni ca // Vdha_3,346.27 //
GP12vd3343au:432: svakayā pakṣa-nāḍyā tvaṃ $ brahmā1ṇḍaṃ sakalaṃ vahan &
GP12vd3343au:433: no7payāsi prabho khedaṃ $ yathā devo janārdanaḥ // Vdha_3,346.28 //
GP12vd3343au:434: tvam ṛṣis tvaṃ mahā-bhāgas $ tvaṃ devaḥ pata-ge3śvaraḥ &
GP12vd3343au:435: tvaṃ prabhus tapana-prakhyas $ tvaṃ nas trāṇam anuttamam // Vdha_3,346.29
GP12vd3343au:436: balo3rmimān sā1dhvara-dīna-sattvaḥ $ samṛddhimān duṣ-prasahas tvam eva &
GP12vd3343au:437: tapaḥ śrutaṃ sarvam ahīna-kīrtir $ anāgatā3dīn viṣayāṃś ca vetsi //
GP12vd3343au:438: tvam uttamaḥ sarvam idaṃ carā1caraṃ $ gabhastibhir bhānur ivā7vabhāse &
GP12vd3343au:439: samākṣipan bhānu-suta-prabhāṃ muhus $ tvam antakaḥ sarvam idaṃ
GP12vd3343au:440: divā-karaḥ parikramati yathā dahan $ prajās tathā dahasi hutā1śana-prabha
GP12vd3343au:441: bhayaṃkaraḥ pralaya ivā7gnir utthito $ vināśayaty uraga-parivartapā1ntakṛt
GP12vd3343au:442: kha-ge3śvaraṃ śaraṇam upāgato 'smy ahaṃ $ mahaujasaṃ vitimira-bhragocaram
GP12vd3343au:443: mahā-balaṃ garuḍam upetya khe-caraṃ $ mahaujasaṃ vara-dam ajeyam aklamam // Vdha_3,346.33
GP12vd3343au:447: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca stutas tu garuḍo rājñā $ pṛṣṭha-māro 'py apārthivam &
GP12vd3343au:448: darśayām āsa devasya $ viṣṇor amita-tejasaḥ // Vdha_3,347.1 //
GP12vd3343au:450: tuṣṭāva bhaktyā rāje1ndra $ deve3śam aparājitam // Vdha_3,347.2 //
GP12vd3343au:451: vasur uvāca namas te puṇḍarīkā1kṣa $ śaraṇā3gata-vatsala &
GP12vd3343au:455: na te viduḥ sura-gaṇāḥ $ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:456: ādis tvaṃ sarva-dharmāṇām $ ṛṣīṇāṃ ca jagad-guro // Vdha_3,347.5 //
GP12vd3343au:457: sūkṣmas tvaṃ sarva-bhūtebhyo $ mahadbhyaś ca mahattaraḥ &
GP12vd3343au:458: dūra-gas tvaṃ mahā-bhāga $ sarveṣām api cā8gataḥ // Vdha_3,347.6 //
GP12vd3343au:461: puruṣas tvaṃ tvam avyaktas $ tvam ātmā buddhir eva ca &
GP12vd3343au:462: mahā-bhūtāni bhagavas $ tvaṃ tathaive7ndriyāṇi ca // Vdha_3,347.8 //
GP12vd3343au:464: ye tvāṃ bhajanti te yānti $ bhagavan paramāṃ gatim // Vdha_3,347.9 //
GP12vd3343au:465: jayam anagham ajeyaṃ viśva-gaṃ deva-devaṃ $ tridaśa-ripu-vināśe nityam
GP12vd3343au:471: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca vasunā vasu-veśena $ vāgminā viṣṇur īḍitaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:472: uvāca prā1ñjaliṃ prahvaṃ $ pārthivaṃ purataḥ sthitam // Vdha_3,348.1 //
GP12vd3343au:473: vāsudeva uvāca nā7nṛtaṃ nṛpa vaktavyaṃ $ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha-gair api &
GP12vd3343au:474: dharma-praśno na vaktavyas $ tathaikena viśeṣataḥ // Vdha_3,348.2 //
GP12vd3343au:476: dur-vijñeyās tathā dharmāḥ $ sūkṣmā rājan dur-anvayāḥ // Vdha_3,348.3 //
GP12vd3343au:477: tasmān naikena vaktavyāḥ $ kadācid api jānatā &
GP12vd3343au:478: uktvā9nṛtaṃ mahat prāptaṃ $ tvayā kṛcchraṃ narā1dhipa // Vdha_3,348.4 //
GP12vd3343au:480: mama bhakto 'si satataṃ $ tena te niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā // Vdha_3,348.5 //
GP12vd3343au:481: kālenā7lpena kalpena $ yā na śakyā surā1suraiḥ &
GP12vd3343au:482: gaccha pālaya rājyaṃ tvaṃ $ tathaivā7vicalo bhava // Vdha_3,348.6 //
GP12vd3343au:484: brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtaṃ $ vijñeyaṃ daivataṃ param // Vdha_3,348.7 //
GP12vd3343au:485: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca evam uktvā vasuṃ viṣṇus $ tatraivā7darśanaṃ gataḥ &
GP12vd3343au:486: tārkṣyeṇa sahito rājan $ vismitaś cā7bhavad vasuḥ // Vdha_3,348.8 //
GP12vd3343au:487: rājyaṃ cā7vāpa bhūyo 'pi $ khe-cara-tvaṃ tathaiva ca &
GP12vd3343au:488: tataḥ sa-bhājitaś cā7pi $ devaiḥ sarvaiḥ samāgataiḥ // Vdha_3,348.9 //
GP12vd3343au:489: evaṃ sa devena hi bhakti-yukto $ rasātala-stho vasudhā2dhipe3śaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:490: bhayāt sughorāt pravimucya yukto $ rājyena gatvā nabhasas tathaiva //
GP12vd3343au:493: vajra uvāca viśva-rūpaṃ samācakṣva $ devadevasya cakriṇaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:495: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca ekānta-bhāvanā-bhaktair $ dṛṣṭāni bahuśaḥ purā &
GP12vd3343au:496: viśva-rūpāṇi devasya $ yāny aśakyāni bhāṣitum // Vdha_3,349.2 //
GP12vd3343au:498: viśva-rūpa-dharaṃ draṣṭuṃ $ tāvac chaktir na vidyate // Vdha_3,349.3 //
GP12vd3343au:499: tatra yad darśitaṃ caiva $ nāradasya purā9nagha &
GP12vd3343au:500: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi $ viśvadevena viṣṇunā // Vdha_3,349.4 //
GP12vd3343au:504: hariḥ kṛṣṇo naraś caiva $ tathā nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // Vdha_3,349.6 //
GP12vd3343au:505: hariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sthit[au] vṛtte $ tadā lokā1ntare kila &
GP12vd3343au:506: nara-nārāyaṇau devau $ tapasy ugre tathā ratau // Vdha_3,349.7 //
GP12vd3343au:509: dadarśa nāradas tatra $ tāv ubhau dīpta-tejasau &
GP12vd3343au:510: abhivādya gatau devau $ tayos tu purataḥ sthitaḥ // Vdha_3,349.9 //
GP12vd3343au:514: dadarśa vighnaṃ kurvāṇau $ deva-karma tathā9naghau // Vdha_3,349.11 //
GP12vd3343au:515: tataḥ kṛtā3hnik[au] prāha $ nāradas tau jagad-gurū &
GP12vd3343au:516: bhavantau jagatāṃ nāthau $ bhavantau parame3śvarau // Vdha_3,349.12 //
GP12vd3343au:518: bhavadbhyām arcyate kaś ca $ daive pitrye ca kalpyate // Vdha_3,349.13 //
GP12vd3343au:519: prakṛtir yā parā9smākaṃ $ yataḥ sarvasya saṃbhavaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:521: pūjayāmaḥ sadā brahman $ daive pitrye ca kalpite &
GP12vd3343au:522: viprān deva-gurūn gāś ca $ pitṝṃś caiva jagat-traye // Vdha_3,349.15 //
GP12vd3343au:523: ye 'rcayanty arcayanty eva $ taṃ devaṃ parame3śvaram &
GP12vd3343au:524: yo 'yam apy arcayed devaṃ $ tena syāt pūjito hariḥ // Vdha_3,349.16 //
GP12vd3343au:525: vidhi-hīnaṃ mahā-bhāga $ sa hi sarva-gato yataḥ &
GP12vd3343au:526: devasyā7nyasya yac cā7rcāṃ $ kartu-kāmo 'rcayed dharim // Vdha_3,349.17 //
GP12vd3343au:527: tena tasya kṛtā7rcā syād $ dvija-śreṣṭha vidhānataḥ &
GP12vd3343au:528: deve yasmāt surāḥ sarvaṃ $ trailokyam api yad gatam // Vdha_3,349.18 //
GP12vd3343au:530: nā7sti lokeṣu tad brahma $ yatra nā7sti janārdanaḥ // Vdha_3,349.19 //
GP12vd3343au:531: na tad apy asti lokeṣu $ yan na viṣṇau pratiṣṭhitam &
GP12vd3343au:532: yasmin sarvaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ $ yaḥ sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ // Vdha_3,349.20
GP12vd3343au:533: yaś ca sarva-mayo nityaṃ $ tasmai sarvā3tmane namaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:536: upetāś ca tathā sarve $ cakrava[r]ty-upalakṣaṇaiḥ // Vdha_3,349.22 //
GP12vd3343au:540: taiḥ sārdhaṃ ramate nityaṃ $ taiś ca saṃpūjyate sadā // Vdha_3,349.24 //
GP12vd3343au:542: akāmāś ca jagannātham $ arcayanti sadā ca ye // Vdha_3,349.25 //
GP12vd3343au:543: te yānti deham utsṛjya $ tad dvīpaṃ śveta-saṃjñitam &
GP12vd3343au:546: pūjayanti hariṃ tatra $ divyaṃ varṣa-śataṃ punaḥ // Vdha_3,349.27 //
GP12vd3343au:548: brahmaṃs tapobhiḥ pradyumnaṃ $ tataḥ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ prabhum // Vdha_3,349.28
GP12vd3343au:549: vāsudevaṃ tataḥ prāpya $ tenaiva sadṛśās tataḥ &
GP12vd3343au:550: bhavanti sarve sarvatra $ sarvadā sarvaśaktayaḥ // Vdha_3,349.29 //
GP12vd3343au:551: muktāś ca sarva-duḥkhebhyaḥ $ paraṃ sukham upāgatāḥ &
GP12vd3343au:552: sa tvaṃ śīghram ito gatvā $ śvetadvīpa-nivāsinaḥ // Vdha_3,349.30 //
GP12vd3343au:553: paśya tvaṃ puruṣān brahman $ prasannaḥ sa vibhus tava &
GP12vd3343au:554: darśayiṣyati rūpaṃ tu $ trailokyā1dbhutam adbhutam // Vdha_3,349.31 //
GP12vd3343au:556: ekataś ca dvitaś caiva $ tritaś caiva mahā-tapāḥ // Vdha_3,349.32 //
GP12vd3343au:557: taṃ tu deśaṃ gatā brahman $ na tair dṛṣṭo janārdanaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:561: jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa $ namas te viśva-bhāvana &
GP12vd3343au:562: namas te 'stu hṛṣīkeśa $ mahā-puruṣa pūrva-ja // Vdha_3,349.35 //
GP12vd3343au:563: ślokam etaṃ tu te śrutvā $ śrutavantas tathā giram &
GP12vd3343au:566: śvetadvīpe gatir nāsti $ vinā caikā1ntibhir dvijāḥ // Vdha_3,349.37 //
GP12vd3343au:568: tapaso9greṇa saṃyuktās $ tena me deśam āgatāḥ // Vdha_3,349.38 //
GP12vd3343au:569: sāmānya-bhakti-sattvāś ca $ punar vrajata mā ciram &
GP12vd3343au:571: ebhiḥ ślokais tathā dṛṣṭo $ bhavatī7ti janārdanaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:572: ekā1ntabhāvanā4saktaiḥ $ ślokais tu puruṣair imam // Vdha_3,349.40 //
GP12vd3343au:573: japtavyaṃ satataṃ viprās $ tataḥ punar ih[ai]ṣyatha &
GP12vd3343au:577: ślokam etaṃ paṭhed viprā $ namas-kāre pradakṣiṇe &
GP12vd3343au:578: snānam etena kartavyaṃ $ tathā cā7nte jalaṃ dvijāḥ // Vdha_3,349.43 //
GP12vd3343au:580: śloka eṣa vinirdiṣṭaḥ $ sarva-kāma-pradaḥ śivaḥ // Vdha_3,349.44 //
GP12vd3343au:581: āpat-prāptena japtavyaṃ $ tan mokṣā1rthaṃ tathaiva ca &
GP12vd3343au:582: etasya jāpaḥ kartavyo $ nityam eva vijānatā // Vdha_3,349.45 //
GP12vd3343au:583: etasya jāpāt puruṣaḥ $ sarvān kāmān upāśnute &
GP12vd3343au:584: etāṃ śrutvā tu te vāṇīṃ $ cā8gatā magadhāḥ punaḥ // Vdha_3,349.46 //
GP12vd3343au:586: yājako yasya dharmātmā $ devā3cāryo bṛhaspatiḥ // Vdha_3,349.47 //
GP12vd3343au:587: adṛśyena hṛto bhāgas $ tatra devena viṣṇunā &
GP12vd3343au:588: jagṛhur devatāḥ sarvā $ dṛśya-bhāgāt purodhasaḥ // Vdha_3,349.48 //
GP12vd3343au:590: ekataś ca dvitaś caiva $ tritaś caivam avocatam // Vdha_3,349.49 //
GP12vd3343au:591: adṛśyaḥ sarva-devānāṃ $ taṃ kathaṃ draṣṭum icchasi &
GP12vd3343au:592: ity evam anunītas tu $ devācryo bṛhaspatiḥ // Vdha_3,349.50 //
GP12vd3343au:593: samāpayām āsa tadā $ taṃ yajñaṃ pārthivasya ca &
GP12vd3343au:597: tasmāt taṃ deva-deve3śaṃ $ tatra-sthaṃ paśya nārada &
GP12vd3343au:598: tvayā9pi deva-kāryāṇi $ kartavyāni bahūny atha // Vdha_3,349.53 //
GP12vd3343au:601: kalpā1vasāne tu gatiṃ $ tāṃ tvaṃ vipra gamiṣyasi // Vdha_3,349.54 //
GP12vd3343au:602: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca evam uktas tataḥ śīghraṃ $ mano-māruta-raṃhasā &
GP12vd3343au:603: abhivādyā7tha tau devau $ taṃ dvīpaṃ nārado gataḥ // Vdha_3,349.55 //
GP12vd3343au:605: pūjayām āsa śirasā $ tāṃś ca bhaktyā sa nāradaḥ // Vdha_3,349.56 //
GP12vd3343au:607: dadarśa tān eva narāñ $ śvetā[ṃś] candra-prabhāñ śubhān // Vdha_3,349.57
GP12vd3343au:608: pūjayām āsa śirasā $ manasā tais tu pūjitaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:611: stotraṃ jagau sa viśvāya $ nirguṇāya guṇā3tmane // Vdha_3,349.59 //
GP12vd3343au:785: bhakto 'haṃ tvāṃ didṛkṣur ekāntadarśanāye7ty oṃ namaḥ /
GP12vd3343au:789: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca sa dadarśa tadā viṣṇuṃ $ viśva-rūpa-dharaṃ harim &
GP12vd3343au:798: anirdeśyāni varṇāni $ tathā bibhrat kvacit kvacit // Vdha_3,351.5 //
GP12vd3343au:802: grahāṇām atha ṛkṣāṇāṃ $ rudrāṇāṃ vasubhiḥ saha // Vdha_3,351.7 //
GP12vd3343au:803: ādityānāṃ sa-marutāṃ $ bhṛgūṇāṃ ca tathā dvija &
GP12vd3343au:804: tathaivā7ṅgiraso rājan $ sādhyānām aśvibhiḥ saha // Vdha_3,351.8 //
GP12vd3343au:809: kānicit tasya saumyāni $ kānicid bhīṣaṇāni ca &
GP12vd3343au:810: dadarśa tasya vaktrāṇi $ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,351.11 //
GP12vd3343au:812: dadarśa sarvataś cā7gnīn $ grasyamānāṃś ca viṣṇunā // Vdha_3,351.12 //
GP12vd3343au:813: saumyebhyas tasya vaktrebhyo $ nirgacchantyas tathā prajāḥ &
GP12vd3343au:814: vāhāṃś ca vividhāṃs tasya $ sa dadarśā7tha nāradaḥ // Vdha_3,351.13 //
GP12vd3343au:816: yuktān nānā-vidhair bhāṇḍair $ āyudhaiś ca sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,351.14 //
GP12vd3343au:818: kecic ca kalaśaṃ ghaṇṭāṃ $ śaṅkha-padmo1tpalā3dibhiḥ // Vdha_3,351.15 //
GP12vd3343au:822: bīja-pūrṇā1kṣa-mālāś ca $ pūrṇa-pātrais tathā paraiḥ // Vdha_3,351.17 //
GP12vd3343au:823: evaṃ nānā-vidhair bhāṇḍaiḥ $ karāṃs tasya samanvitān &
GP12vd3343au:826: śirāṃsi dṛṣṭayo hastāṃs $ tasya devasya dṛṣṭavān // Vdha_3,351.19 //
GP12vd3343au:827: trailokyaṃ ca T kāye $ sakalaṃ muni-sattamaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:830: jagat samagraṃ devasya $ deha-sthaṃ dṛṣṭavān muniḥ // Vdha_3,351.21 //
GP12vd3343au:831: sa dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ rūpaṃ $ bhīto hṛṣṭaś ca vismitaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:832: papāta pādayos tasya $ śirasā sā1śru-locanaḥ // Vdha_3,351.22 //
GP12vd3343au:834: tam uvāca tato devaḥ $ prahasann ṛṣi-sattamam // Vdha_3,351.23 //
GP12vd3343au:835: śrībhagavān uvāca uttiṣṭha mā bhair dharma-jña $ varaṃ vṛṇu yathe1psitam &
GP12vd3343au:836: śrīnārada uvāca nityam ekā1ntike deva $ bhaktir bhavatu sā tvayi &
GP12vd3343au:837: nā7nyaṃ varaṃ kāmayāmi $ narāṇām idam uttamam // Vdha_3,351.24 //
GP12vd3343au:838: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca tam uvāca tato devaḥ $ praṇatā3rti-haro hariḥ &
GP12vd3343au:839: etan nisarga-siddhaṃ te $ yena tvaṃ dṛṣṭavān mama // Vdha_3,351.25 //
GP12vd3343au:840: viśva-rūpam idaṃ brahmann $ avajñeyaṃ tathā tvayā &
GP12vd3343au:841: tapas taptaṃ yato vipra $ mamā7pi ca tatas tava // Vdha_3,351.26 //
GP12vd3343au:842: rūpam etat samāsthāya $ rūpaṃ svaṃ dvija darśitam &
GP12vd3343au:843: icchā-rūpāṇy ahaṃ kuryāṃ $ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,351.27 //
GP12vd3343au:845: mamaiva tāni jānīha $ matto 'nyan nā7sti kiṃcana // Vdha_3,351.28 //
GP12vd3343au:846: ahaṃ bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca $ vartamānam ahaṃ tathā &
GP12vd3343au:847: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva $ sarvam evā7smi nārada // Vdha_3,351.29 //
GP12vd3343au:848: sac cā7sac cā7ham evā7tra $ tattvam etad bravīmi te &
GP12vd3343au:851: yaḥ kariṣyati me stotraṃ $ stotreṇa tvat-kṛtena tu // Vdha_3,351.31 //
GP12vd3343au:852: tasya kāmān vidhāsyāmi $ ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ &
GP12vd3343au:853: śveta-dvīpe gatis tasya $ mṛtasya ca bhaviṣyati // Vdha_3,351.32 //
GP12vd3343au:856: vārāhe tu gate kalpe $ tato mātsyo bhaviṣyati &
GP12vd3343au:857: deva-kāryāṇi kāryāṇi $ subahūni yatas tvayā // Vdha_3,351.34 //
GP12vd3343au:859: prādur-bhāvāṇi me brahman $ vyatītāni sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,351.35 //
GP12vd3343au:860: bhaviṣyanti tathā9nyāni $ tatra me śṛṇu kānicit &
GP12vd3343au:863: ahaṃ matsyas tathā kūrmo $ haṃso 'ham api nārada // Vdha_3,351.37 //
GP12vd3343au:865: mayā9śva-śirasā vedā $ dānavebhyas tathā hṛtāḥ // Vdha_3,351.38 //
GP12vd3343au:867: vārāheṇa mayā daityāḥ $ pātāla-tala-gā hatāḥ // Vdha_3,351.39 //
GP12vd3343au:869: dānavāś ca hatā yuddhe $ nara-nārāyaṇā3tmanā // Vdha_3,351.40 //
GP12vd3343au:870: loko1ttare tathā mārge $ hariḥ kṛṣṇas tathā9py aham &
GP12vd3343au:872: vāmanena mayā bhūtvā $ bales tribhuvanaṃ hṛtam &
GP12vd3343au:873: tribhiḥ kramaiḥ purā brahman $ devānāṃ hita-kāmyayā // Vdha_3,351.42 //
GP12vd3343au:875: pṛthvī vasu-matī brahman $ pṛthunā ca mayā kṛtā // Vdha_3,351.43 //
GP12vd3343au:877: dattātreyeṇa vasudhā $ devā dvija.gaṇāḥ punaḥ // Vdha_3,351.44 //
GP12vd3343au:880: dattvā caturdhā putrāṃś ca $ mayā daśarathasya ca &
GP12vd3343au:883: meghanāda-vadhaḥ kāryo $ lakṣmaṇena tathā mayā // Vdha_3,351.47 //
GP12vd3343au:884: śatrughnena ca kartavyo $ lavaṇasya vadhas tathā &
GP12vd3343au:885: mayā vālmīkinā kāryaṃ $ kāvyaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ tathā // Vdha_3,351.48 //
GP12vd3343au:886: vyāsena vedā vaktavyā $ ākhyānaṃ bhārataṃ mahat &
GP12vd3343au:888: pāṇḍoḥ putra-tvam āsādya $ pañcadhā ca tathā mayā &
GP12vd3343au:889: dvidhā ca vasudevasya $ laghvī kāryā vasuṃdharā // Vdha_3,351.50 //
GP12vd3343au:891: balabhadreṇa ca mayā $ hantavyā mauṣṭikā3dayaḥ // Vdha_3,351.51 //
GP12vd3343au:893: pradyumnena nihantavyaḥ $ śambaraś ca mahā-balaḥ // Vdha_3,351.52 //
GP12vd3343au:895: sāmbena yuyudhānena $ mayā bhūtvā tathaiva ca // Vdha_3,351.53 //
GP12vd3343au:896: mayā buddhena vaktavyā $ dharmāḥ kali-yuge punaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:899: ṛṣayaś ca tathā jñeyā $ mamaivā7ṃśa-samudbhavāḥ // Vdha_3,351.55 //
GP12vd3343au:900: yad yad vibhūti-mat sattvaṃ $ śrīmad-ūrjitam eva ca &
GP12vd3343au:901: tat tad evā7vagacches tvaṃ $ mama tejo-'ṃśa-saṃbhavam // Vdha_3,351.56 //
GP12vd3343au:902: atha vā bahunaitena $ kiṃ jñānena tavā7nagha &
GP12vd3343au:903: viṣṭabhyā7ham idaṃ kṛtsnam $ ekā1ṃśenā8sthito jagat // Vdha_3,351.57 //
GP12vd3343au:904: tad gaccha mānasī siddhiḥ $ sadā te 'stu dvijo1ttama &
GP12vd3343au:907: bhagavān nāradaś cakre $ pujāṃ tad-deśa-vāsinām // Vdha_3,351.59 //
GP12vd3343au:908: taiś ca saṃpūjito vipras $ tān praṇamya yata-vrataḥ &
GP12vd3343au:910: pādayor nyapatat tatra $ sa tayor muni-pūjyayoḥ &
GP12vd3343au:911: tābhyāṃ saṃpūjito vipras $ tatro7vāsa tad-āśrame // Vdha_3,351.61 //
GP12vd3343au:912: tataḥ kadācit taṃ vipram $ ūcatus tau tapo-dhanau &
GP12vd3343au:913: āvābhyāṃ tvaṃ tathā dṛṣṭaḥ $ śveta-dvīpa-gate 'cyutaḥ // Vdha_3,351.62 //
GP12vd3343au:915: loke 'smin muni-śārdūla $ nāsti dhanyataras tvayā // Vdha_3,351.63 //
GP12vd3343au:916: dṛṣṭavān asi yad brahman $ viśva-rūpa-dharaṃ harim &
GP12vd3343au:918: yatas te 'nugrahas tena $ kṛto devena viṣṇunā &
GP12vd3343au:919: tato guhyaṃ nibodhe7maṃ $ tat-pūjā-vidhim uttamam // Vdha_3,351.65 //
GP12vd3343au:921: nā7bhaktāya ca tad deyaṃ $ tvayā brāhmaṇa-sattama // Vdha_3,351.66 //
GP12vd3343au:922: ekā1nta-bhāvo1pagataṃ janārdanaṃ $ naras tu saṃpūjya tathā vidhānataḥ &
GP12vd3343au:923: prayāti tad-dvīpam anuttamaṃ śivaṃ $ na yatra gatvā vinivartate punaḥ //
GP12vd3343au:933: tataḥ padma-karṇikā-madhye śvetaṃ śata-patraṃ padmaṃ dhyāyet //
GP12vd3343au:937: tan-madhye paraṃ puruṣam aśarīram agandham arasam arūpam asparśam aśabdaṃ sarvagaṃ plutā1ntaṃ oṃ-kāraṃ vinyaset //
GP12vd3343au:946: aiśāne dale tad iti brahmāṇaṃ vinyaset /
GP12vd3343au:951: prapūrva-dvāre oṃ keṃ ṭeṃ yeṃ etāny akṣarāṇi vainateyaṃ vinyaset /
GP12vd3343au:958: sveṃ ṭheṃ heṃ theṃ uttare dvāre aniruddhaṃ nyasyet /
GP12vd3343au:960: veṃ ṇeṃ kṣeṃ kṣeṃ vidikṣu pāñca-janyaṃ śaṅkhaṃ nyaset /
GP12vd3343au:962: dheṃ heṃ bheṃ heṃ śriyaṃ padmaṃ dakṣiṇato nyaset /
GP12vd3343au:964: geṃ ḍeṃ veṃ śeṃ padmā1ntarataḥ puṣṭiṃ nyaset /
GP12vd3343au:974: oṃ cheṃ ṭheṃ vāyavye kaustubhaṃ nyaset /
GP12vd3343au:976: tato maṇḍale bāhya-sthāṃ yathā-sva-diśam o-kārau-kārau (?) dik-patī
GP12vd3343au:979: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāye7ty antena dvādaśā1kṣareṇa karṇikā-madhye
GP12vd3343au:982: oṃ jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namas te viśva-bhāvana /
GP12vd3343au:988: anena vidhinā yas tu $ viṣṇum abhyarcayen naraḥ &
GP12vd3343au:989: sarvān saṃsādhayed arthān $ kṛta-kṛtyo hi jāyate // Vdha_3,352.1 //
GP12vd3343au:990: kṛtvā vyādhiṃ vyā[dh]itaṃ bhakṣayati na karoti na tad āpnoti idaṃ tv anyat
GP12vd3343au:993: ārogyaṃ dhana-dhānya-vardhanaṃ śatrughnaṃ vaśī-karaṇaṃ yaḥ puruṣo 'nena
GP12vd3343au:994: vidhinā satataṃ devam abhyarcayati saṃpattiṃ janayati athavā tasya na rocate tadā śveta-dvīpam
GP12vd3343au:995: avpyāpya arka-maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā niruṇaddhi pradyumna-saṃkarṣaṇān prāpnoti sudeva-tvam avāpya
GP12vd3343au:1000: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca etad dhi nāradaḥ śrutvā $ nara-nārāyaṇe3ritam &
GP12vd3343au:1003: tataḥ puṃsavano bhagavān $ nāradasya mahā4tmanaḥ // Vdha_3,353.2 //
GP12vd3343au:1004: pratyakṣataḥ punar bhūtaṃ $ nāradaṃ vākyam abravīt &
GP12vd3343au:1005: gaccha nārada bhadra tvaṃ $ lokāṃś cara yathe4psitān // Vdha_3,353.3 //
GP12vd3343au:1007: anugraham idaṃ prāpya $ deve3śāt puruṣottamāt // Vdha_3,353.4 //
GP12vd3343au:1008: cacāra nārado lokān $ nityaṃ saṃpūjayan harim &
GP12vd3343au:1009: viśva-rūpam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ $ nāradena mahā4tmanā // Vdha_3,353.5 //
GP12vd3343au:1011: tathā cā7mṛtakādehe $ tenaiva ca mahā4tmanā // Vdha_3,353.6 //
GP12vd3343au:1012: brahmaṇā ca purā dṛṣṭaṃ $ t[r]ailokyā3kramaṇe punaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:1013: paścime sāgare dṛṣṭaṃ $ daśa-grīveṇa rakṣasā // Vdha_3,353.7 //
GP12vd3343au:1018: nivṛtte bhārate yuddhe $ gacchanto dvārakāṃ punaḥ &
GP12vd3343au:1019: mārgā3gatena tad dṛṣṭam $ uttaṅkena mahā4tmanā // Vdha_3,353.10 //
GP12vd3343au:1021: tasya karṃāṇi yo nityaṃ $ puruṣaḥ parikīrtayet // Vdha_3,353.11 //
GP12vd3343au:1023: sarva-pāpa-vinirmuktaḥ $ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // Vdha_3,353.12 //
GP12vd3343au:1024: evaṃ sa rājan dvija-varya-mukhyaḥ $ saṃprāptavān deva-varāt prasādam &
GP12vd3343au:1025: bhaktikramakraiyanṛpaprasādāt $ tasmād dhi kāmān puruṣā labhante //
